ISSUE.TITLE: do not want to provide all devices on my pc
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Hi, sorry to bother you again! I have 4 devices on my pc and i just want to provide two to stf. i tried to run provider serial1 serial2 , provider [serial1 serial2], provider serial1, serial2 and so on , but none works is there a way to do this or i have to run two provider like , provider serial1 , provider serial2. i just want to run one provider and provide two devices thank you
